mapper.update: update t_data_switch_times set DEVICE_NO = #{device_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANALY_DATE = #{analy_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SWITCH_TIMES = #{switch_times,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{last_modify_time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DEVICE_NO = #{device_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ANALY_DATE = #{analy_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from t_data_switch_times where DEVICE_NO=#{device_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ANALY_DATE=#{analy_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
